data.comment: The match has started.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Cameron McGeehan.
In the minute 8, Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through a header from Paul Onuachu.
Great play from Joakim Maehle to set up the goal.
At Luminus Arena, Cameron McGeehan has been yellow-carded for the away team.
The first-half is over at Luminus Arena.
In the minute 45, Makhtar Gueye (Oostende) has received a yellow card from Nicolas Laforge.
The second-half is underway in Genk.
In the minute 48, Jhon Lucumi (Genk) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
An attacking Genk player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Paul Onuachu smashes in a penalty at Luminus Arena. The score is now 2-1.
In the minute 56, Bastien Toma (Genk) is red-carded and dismissed.
Jess Thorup is making the team's first substitution at Luminus Arena with Daniel Munoz replacing Luca Oyen.
Indy Boonen is on a sub for Kevin Vandendriessche for Oostende.
In the minute 75, Mats Moller Daehli is replacing Kristian Thorstvedt for the home team.
Makhtar Gueye scores with his head for Oostende to level the match at 2-2.
That's a fine assist from Jelle Bataille.
In the minute 88, Andrew Hjulsager for Oostende has been booked by Nicolas Laforge and receives a first yellow card.
Alexander Blessin (Oostende) is making a second substitution, with Marko Kvasina replacing Makhtar Gueye.
It's 2-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Nick Batzner is replacing Andrew Hjulsager for Oostende at Luminus Arena.
Jere Uronen, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Gerardo Arteaga is the substitute for Genk.
Oostende's Jelle Bataille has been booked in Genk.
At Luminus Arena, Theo Ndicka has been yellow-carded for the away team.
